title: Lamb tagine with apricots and honey

ingredients.content: 200 g carrots, peeled and cut into pieces (approx. 4 cm)
20 g olive oil, plus 2 tbsp extra
500 g lamb shoulder meat, boneless, cut into pieces (4-5 cm)
1 tsp fine salt, plus 1 pinch extra to taste
1 pinch freshly ground black pepper, to taste

preparations.content: Place onions and carrots into mixing bowl and chop <b>7 sec/speed 4<b>.
Add olive oil and sauté <b>6 min/120°C/speed <b> without measuring cup.

Add lamb, ginger, cinnamon, saffron, lemon, honey, cumin, 1tsp salt and pepper and cook <b>60 min/80°C//speed <b>. Meanwhile, place semolina, 2 tbsp olive oil and 1 pinch salt into a bowl. Mix with a fork and cover with water at room temperature. Allow to soak.

Place apricots and almonds into mixing bowl. Mix semolina gently with a fork to break any lumps and transfer into Varoma dish. Place Varoma back into position and cook again <b>15 min/100°C//speed <b>. Transfer lamb tagine and semolina to deep plates. Sprinkle generously with coriander and serve hot.
